title: Debounced Search
instructions:
Create a search component that debounces input to avoid excessive API calls.

Requirements:
1. Create a search input field
2. Debounce the search - only 'search' after 500ms of no typing
3. Display 'Searching...' while the debounce timer is active
4. Show the search results (mocked) after debounce
5. Clear results when input is empty

Debouncing prevents a function from being called too frequently - essential for search inputs.
